checked.description: If `true`, the checkbox will be checked.

disabled.description: If `true`, the checkbox will be disabled

form.description: The id of the form that the checkbox belongs to.

getRootNode.description: A root node to correctly resolve document in custom environments. E.x.: Iframes, Electron.

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.description: The ids of the elements in the checkbox. Useful for composition.

invalid.description: If `true`, the checkbox is marked as invalid.

name.description: The name of the input field in a checkbox. Useful for form submission.

onCheckedChange.description: The callback invoked when the checked state of the `Checkbox` changes.

required.description: If `true`, the checkbox input is marked as required,

value.description: The value of checkbox input. Useful for form submission.
